content: **knitted shawl in drops fabel and drops brushed alpaca silk piece is knitted sideways in moss stitch and edge stitches ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-556 yarn group a and c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured along the middle = approx 28 cm width measured along the top side from side to side = approx 125 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 924 confetti cake and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 23 row vertically with moss stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
